CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The resultant sidechain D-A polymer exhibited high carrier mobility and outstanding photovoltaic properties in polymer solar cells with a PCE as high as 4.89% .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| sidechain D-A polymer |
| polymer solar cells |

The two entities identified as "Material Name" are "sidechain D-A polymer" and "polymer solar cells". These entities are mentioned in their exact words as they appear in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| sidechain D-A polymer |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, I have determined that there is only one clear "Material Name" entity in the text. The entity "polymer solar cells" is not a specific material but rather a type of device that uses a material. Therefore, the only valid "Material Name" entity is "sidechain D-A polymer".
